description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows kernel elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-30064):

1. Apply the KB-5039330 update by downloading it from the Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Restart your system to ensure that the update is fully implemented.

**Details**:
- This update is designed to mitigate the risks associated with integer overflow and wraparound vulnerabilities in the Windows kernel.
- Ensure your system meets the product build ID: 20650c77-a5fb-abcc-ce61-0dd62b3a73c4, as it is essential for this patch.
- You can find more information on the update at the MSRC link: [Update Guide](https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2024-30064).

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is running the appropriate build version.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installation of the update.
